about.name: Jose's Cantina
about.story: Jose's Cantina offers signature blend of authentic Mexican ingredients and innovative culinary techniques. Jose and his team are ready to bring the best of Mexico right to your table! We promise you will love every bite. We invite you to come and enjoy a unique Mexican experience in a friendly and fun atmosphere!

menu.name: Hard Taco
menu.description: American style crispy corn tortilla taco, with choice of protein, cheese, tomato, sour cream

menu.name: Soft Taco
menu.description: American style flour tortilla taco, with choice of protein, cheese, tomato, sour cream

menu.name: Burrrrrito
menu.description: Like a normal burrito, but better

menu.name: Burrito Ranchero
menu.description: Burrito coated with melted white queso and raw onion

menu.name: Nachos Fajitas
menu.description: Delicious nachos with steaming fajitas overtop!

menu.name: Fajitas
menu.description: Grilled protein (smokin' hot), served with guacomole salad, sour cream, pico de gallo, rice and beans. Comes with flour tortillas

menu.name: Chile Relleno
menu.description: Poblano peppers stuffed with picadillo meat, served with guacomole salad, rice and beans

menu.name: Durango
menu.description: Crispy beef taco, chile con queso, chicken sour cream, cheese enchilada, served with rice and beans

menu.name: Flautas
menu.description: Rolled corn tortilla stuffed with chicken, topped with cheese, tomato, gaucamole, and served with rice and beans

menu.name: Bottle
menu.description: Ask server for latest bottle list

menu.name: Draft
menu.description: Ask server for beers on draft
